prompt: I'm going to describe a causal graphical directed acyclic model. There are three variables: <T1>, <T2> and <T3>. <T3> causes <T1>. <T3> causes <T2>.  These are all the causal relationships in the graph
question: In this causal graphical model, is there a path going from <T1> to <T2>?
label: no
